The Visual Rhetoric of Octopus Maps

Octopus Maps in a Nutshell
Image: A famous octopus map by F.W. Rose in 1870, with the Russian depicted as an giant octopus on the top of the map, and the other European countries are depicted as different people.

Octopus Map in a Nutshell

The most famous octopus map is Serio-Comic War Map by F.W. Rose. Personifying the European countries with vivid details.
